name: Kick'n Hell
description:
You have fallen into the depths of hell as a master of the martial arts. Kick your way to the top from one platform to the next, using only the environment and demonic creatures. Combine speed and strategy to reach the end as fast as possible. Do you have what it takes to kick your way out of hell?

This game was made by:

Jochen Robbrechts

Casper Suetens

Simon Bruyneel

Yerlin Marissen Blanco

This awesome game is the result of four creative students who teamed up in the first sprint of 2 Games a Month (2GAM)  2023.

2 Games a Month is a yearly indie development program for aspiring entrepreneurs. It’s a dynamic meeting ground for complementary profiles in which the focus is developing cool games with market potential.
